Here's how we are different

It's our principles

1

Simple, respectful, fair.

No jargon. No games. No greed. Just delightful service for landlords, tenants, and tradespeople alike.

2

A price everyone's happy to pay.

If we overcharged tradespeople, the cost would roll on to landlords and then tenants. No one wins.

3

Harness tech, pass the benefits.

Get repairs scheduled, rent collected, and records updated seamlessly. No chasing, no delays.

So, how can we help you?

Find & Place Tenants

The right tenant in, quickly

  • Marketing your property through OpenRent; listings on Rightmove, and Zoopla
  • Holding keys and arranging viewings
  • Taking care of tenant referencing, paperwork, and move-in process
£300 + VAT (once per tenancy)
Fully refunded when your tenant completes a year. Good tenancies deserve to be celebrated.

Property Management

Our core service

  • Collecting rent and managing arrears
  • Scheduling compliance and safety checks
  • Handling tenant repairs through trusted tradespeople
3% + VAT
Stay as long as you want, leave on a month's notice. On £2,250 rent, that's £81/month. (3.6% inc VAT)

The Essentials

  • Keeping digital records

Included
Our platform always stays up to date, so you stay compliant without lifting a finger.
